QuestData.Title: Raise a Glass!
QuestData.Description:
Pleased to meet you. Name's Venrik. I been scrapin' out a living here in Freehold for years.
Flynn used to be a regular back when he... well I shouldn't say too much. A man's past is his own.
I'll help the two of you out, but first I demand that you let me give you a proper Freehold welcome: A drink!
QuestData.LogDescription: Order a drink from Venrik and drink it.
QuestData.CompletionText: What'sa matter? Cat got yer tongue?
QuestData.RewardText: Ah, nothing like sharing a drink with an old friend... and a new one!
